  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2138</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Varmepumpe</string>
            <string language="en">heat pump</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmepumpe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pompe à chaleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bomba de calor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pompa termica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντλία θερμότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pompa de calor</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Illustrasjonen viser prinsippet bak varmepumper. Denne brukes både til kjøleskap og tiol å varme opp hus.</string>
            <string language="en">The illustration shows the principle behind s heat pump. This is used with a refridgerator and as a heat system for a house.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">varmepumpe</string>
            <string language="en">heat pump</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">kjøleskap</string>
            <string language="en">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt die Grundregel hinter s 
Wärmepumpe. Dieses wird mit einem refridgerator und als 
Hitzesystem für ein Haus verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'illustration montre le principe derrière la 
pompe à chaleur de s. Ceci est utilisé avec un refridgerator 
et comme système de la chaleur pour une maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ilustração mostra o princípio atrás da bomba
de calor de s. Isto é usado com um refridgerator e como um 
sistema do calor para uma casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra il principio dietro la 
pompa termica di s. Ciò è usata con un refridgerator e come 
sistema di calore per una casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αρχή πίσω από την αντλία 
θερμότητας του s. Αυτό χρησιμοποιείται με ένα 
refridgerator και ως σύστημα θερμότητας για ένα σπίτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ilustración muestra el principio detrás de la
pompa de calor de s. Esto se utiliza con un refridgerator y como
sistema del calor para una casa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmepumpe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pompe à chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bomba de calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pompa termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντλία θερμότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pompa de calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refridgerator</string>
          </keyword>
